meanings.definition: Relating to the organization and coordination of complex activities.
meanings.sent1: The team faced a logistical challenge in planning the event.
meanings.sent2: The company's logistical support ensured the project ran smoothly.
meanings.sent3: It was a logistical nightmare trying to fit all the guests in the small venue.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked in a logistical manner, always planning ahead.
meanings.sent5: The logistical puzzle of arranging the seating chart was finally solved.

meanings.definition: Involving the detailed coordination of a complex operation.
meanings.sent1: The military operation required a logistical approach to ensure success.
meanings.sent2: The logistical challenges of the mission were carefully considered.
meanings.sent3: Trying to organize the surprise party was a logistical feat.
meanings.sent4: His speech was a logistical masterpiece, seamlessly weaving in various topics.
meanings.sent5: The logistical precision of the dance routine impressed the audience.
